title: A new Sion and Dr.Mundo Skin
body:
So, my idea is that there is a Dunk master skin for Darius. However like the soccer skins we should have more for basketball. My idea is a Sion and Dr. Mundo basketball skins. For Sion, (Like Darius) his weapon is a basketball hoop that he slams down for Q. For his W, he still has his shield however it is Red and White for Team Noxus. His E he picks a ball up and throws it with power pushing the minion back. Finally for his R, He runs into the team and Dunks when he crashes or it ends. 

For Dr.Mundo, He is the coach for Team Noxus and instead of throwing a knife for his Q, it is a clipboard for the game positions. His W, is basketballs floating around him and his E, he gets angry and gains a temper kind of thing and gains the extra AD that way. Finally his ult, still Green, but he goes happier and is exciting that Noxus is winning and can run faster and gains health that way.

This is just some of my ideas for skins because these champions need to be played more and I think with cool skins like these, it can be achieved.
{{champion:122}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:14}} 

- Tk12
